pages.title: Detox Time
pages.text: If you dared to enter the mist without the protections of a $(item)Respirator$(), you may feel a bit ill, due to the sheer $(thing)Toxicity$() of the $(thing)Mist$(). Thankfully, experimentation in my youth led me to discover 6 edibles which can counter this $(thing)Toxicity$(). I suggest you eat one.
$(item)Bitter Pills$() are the most potent detoxicant, removing a full 10% toxicity. They can be found in the $(thing)Ruins$() of the $(thing)Misty World$() or crafted in a Mortar.
$(item)Tinder Fungus$() can be found rarely in $(thing)Forest Zones$(), growing on the side of $(item)Forest Deceiver$() trees.
$(item)Nightberrries$() can be found at night growing in $(item)Floating Mats$() amongst the water on $(thing)Swamp Zones$(). Can be replanted on the $(item)Floating Mats$() to grow more.

$(item)Stone Tress Berries$() can be found in $(thing)Taiga Zones$(), rarely harvestable from the leaves of $(item)Stone Trees$() from February to March.$(br2)See $(l:dimension_dossier/misty_world/seasons)Seasons$() for more information.

$(item)Swim Bladders$() can be obtained by killing $(l:collected_knowledge/mobs/desert_fish)$(thing)Desert Fish$(), encountered by digging or wetting the $(item)Virgin Dry Clay$() lakebeds (layer below the surface) in $(thing)Desert/Savannah Zones$().
$(item)Gold Mushrooms$() can be found growing on the ground in higher elevation $(thing)Tropical Biomes$() (such as Jungle Hills).
$(item)Silver Mushrooms$() can be found growing on the ground in the $(thing)Tropics Zones$().
